message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to discuss the details with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you've placed on your product, I'm looking to spend closer to $800000.  Let's see if we can find a mutually agreeable price.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to get a better price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to offer the product to you for $850000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value it brings to your business.
